description:
Escape the everyday and rediscover the simple pleasures of spring in "Spring Bunny Islands," a captivating hidden object puzzle game. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of hand-painted landscapes bursting with vibrant blooms in a warm palette of greens and pinks.

Embark on a gentle journey across nine unique islands where playful bunnies have cleverly concealed themselves amongst the colorful flora. With 200 furry friends waiting to be found, sharpen your observation skills and delight in the joy of discovery.

Every element of "Spring Bunny Islands" is meticulously crafted with love, inviting you to lose yourself in the beauty of hand-painted artistry. Let the calming atmosphere wash over you as you explore meticulously detailed scenes, uncovering the secrets nestled within.

More than just a puzzle, "Spring Bunny Islands" offers a soothing escape for players of all ages. Unwind and reconnect with the simple joys of springtime in this charming hidden object adventure.
name: Spring Bunny Islands
